strapiPost.title: J.B. Hunt Announces Quarterly Earnings And Bonuses
strapiPost.content:
This week J.B. Hunt released its fourth-quarter earnings statement and announced plans to give nearly $9m in appreciation bonuses to full-time employees.

  • By the numbers: The company reported earnings of over $201m compared with the $242m earned in the fourth quarter of 2021. Revenue saw a jump this quarter, bringing in $3.64b over last year's $3.49b.
  • Saying thanks: J.B. Hunt will award over $8.8m in appreciation bonuses to full-time drivers, maintenance, and office employees.

Read more on the story on Talk Business & Politics HERE.
